I love this game, but the cheating problem is getting bigger, TBH, i dont care if valve decides to make an intrusive anticheat, because if its intrusive but does better than VAC, then thats a huge step towards demolishing these lowlife cheaters.

use to be lighter to play but now needs higher system requirements to play even on low quality video settings. way more havier than before.  i have spend over $600 over upgrading laptops but after 6 months period it game starts lagging , crash and requires more Graphics card, sd cards and memory rams etc. 
it is good only for people who have real gaming system at home. otherwise it is completely waste of money.

Если играть по фану на серверах типа: серф, прятки и тд, еще сойдет. Но с рандомами в серьёзных матчах - ад. Плюс контингент быдла и школоты, что-то сделаешь не так - сожрут с говном та еще выебут половину твоей семьи...

game is very fun and i enjoy playing faceit

I just finished a game with so many cheaters it was just a dice roll to see who won.  Game after game with people advertising what cheats they're using in chat, voice, even their screen names.  What's the point anymore.

And then they have the nerve to flex on everyone at the end of the match.  This game is in such a sad state.  

Stay. Away.

Se você gosta de perder mais de mil horas da sua vida passando raiva de pessoas que você nem conhece, xingando e sendo xingado, perder horas jogando contra trapaceiros, aprendendo tudo sozinho sobre o jogo e gastando dinheiro com skins... Este é o jogo perfeito para você! Com vários mapas para competir e perder de várias formas diferentes! Divirta-se! 10/10
